lines.text: This is Californie, they were married by a justice of the peace from Nevada, so legally they're not married.
Well if they're not married, that's fine.
But they THINK they're married! And they're flying back to Los Angeles for their honeymoon!
They think they are and they're not?
[laughs]
That's the funniest thing I've heard in years! They think they are and they're not! And they've gone back for their honeymoon?
[stops laughing]
What am I laughing about? That's my daughter.
What do you want with your eggs, bacon or ham?
Bacon.
Ham.
Okay, you'll both get bacon because I don't feel like cutting into a new ham.
How do you want your eggs, up or over?
Up.
Over.
Okay, I'll make them all up so we don't get confused.
If there's nobody else here, why are you cooking six eggs?
I always eat six eggs for breakfast.

[sees the table]
And do you always eat those six eggs on three plates?
No, those other two are for Coco here.
[the black bird perches on his arm]
Don't you get lonesome being here all alone?
No, I like people. Not seeing many of 'em keeps me liking 'em.
But, you can't marry this man you've known only four days. You've known head waiters longer.
One of you's gonna get married and the other one's going to jail, so you really got a lot in common.
Do you mind if I drink that champagne? I've got to take a pill.
Do you feel poorly, Mr. Keenan?
Not yet, but I expect to in 39 minutes.
Well, I don't mind having a fortune hunter in the family, but I'll be darned if I'll stand for a piano player!
Who's down there, or I'll shoot!
Well, go ahead and shoot - only make sure you aim at me!

[after kissing Steve]
Mustard!
Remember that bullet I whizzed right past your head?
Yeah, for a minute I thought you trying to hit me.
I was.

[singsong]
I'm not going anywhere with you!
Oh yes you are!
No I'm not I'm not I'm nooooot.
Then Stevie will just have to come in and taaaake you!
What's wrong with me, may I ask?
We've had horse thieves in our family, but no tenors!
Well, ain't much difference 'tween kidnapping and marriage. You get snatched from your parents, but in marriage nobody offers a reward.
That dame. Undoubtedly the outstanding screwball of her generation.
Now, if you're really gonna fight let's not pay too much attention about breakin' clean and hittin' in the clinches. Let's have a nice, clean dirty fight.
What do you want from me? I'm not a bad guy. I go to a movie, a dog gets runned over, I'm the first guy to cry.
I tell you what - you feel like getting runned over, I'll be glad to do the same for you.

[snarling as he walks away]
Wise guy!

[as a retort]
Wise guy!

[pushes the dresser against the door to keep Steve out, he climbs in the window behind her, singsong]
I'd like to see I'd like to see you taaaaaake me!

[mocking singsong voice]
Anything to oblige, anything to oblige, anything to oblige a laaaaady!
